page.title: 16RECREATION AREAS
page.content: In our survey we had the opportunity to find out about the different Recreation and Leisure areas that the people in Harbury visited. From our questionaire 80% of those asked, ranging from children to adults, went to the local playing fields. People said that they went here to relax and enjoy themselves for there was a play area of swings and slides, a tarzan swing and logs, an extensive grassed area for different sports (and to exercise the dog) with two tennis courts. The average travelling time to the area was approximately 5 minutes due to the central location and on average people stayed between one and two hours at a time. It was used more often in the Spring and Summer months.
